snippet: David Pastrnak broke a tie late in the second period Friday night, and the visiting Boston Bruins beat the Islanders, 5-3.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Boston Bruins defeat New York Islanders, 5-3; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: David Pastrnak broke a tie late in the second period Friday night, and the visiting Boston Bruins beat the Islanders, 5-3.

headline.print_headline: Bruins Put Brakes on Islanders’ Four-Game Winning Streak
headline.main: Bruins Put Brakes on Islanders’ Four-Game Winning Streak
